New Records: Nicholas Kirton scored 49 runs for Canada, including 3 fours and 2 sixes.
Mark Adair took 1 wicket for Ireland and scored 34 runs, including 3 fours and 1 six.
Key Match Events: Canada won the match by 12 runs after Ireland fell to 125/7 in 20 overs.
Nicholas Kirton was named Player of the Match for his impactful performance.
Pre-Game Insights: Ireland elected to field first after winning the toss.
The match was part of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024 Group A.
Post-Match Reflections: Canada secured a crucial win in the series, while Ireland struggles to maintain their form.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at Nassau County International Cricket Stadium, New York.
Others: Umpires: Richard Kettleborough, Sam Nogajski (DRS), Chris Brown (TV Umpire), Chris Gaffaney (Reserve Umpire).
